entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who is being questioned by Harry. He is described as looking at Harry 'slantwise'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is trying to convince Griphook that he is not seeking treasure for personal gain.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who looks at Ron with astonishment.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another one of Harry's friends who looks at Hermione with astonishment.

relationships.description: Harry is being questioned by Griphook about his intentions.
Hermione and Ron look at each other with astonishment.
